Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Cartel Pictures LLC'], 'Producers': ['Monica Castellanos', 'Angie Harmon', 'Laura Notarianni', 'David Rambo', 'Michael Rosenberg', 'Stan Spry', 'Eric Scott Woods'], 'Studio': ['Lifetime']}
Review Text: I love Angie Harmon, that’s why I bought this movie.  Left me hanging and not in a good way, not even a cliff hanger… just the end.  Make a part 2 and finish the. Movie.
Review Title: Terrible Ending

actual_interaction.text: I love Angie Harmon, that’s why I bought this movie.  Left me hanging and not in a good way, not even a cliff hanger… just the end.  Make a part 2 and finish the. Movie.
